text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh la tslku turuq alshytan, wman yasluk turuq alshaytan fa'iinah yamrh bqbyh alafeal wmnkratha, walawla fadl allah ealaa almuminin warahmatuh bihim ma tahur minhum 'ahad abdana min dns dhnbh, wlkn allh- bfdlh- yutahir min ysha'. wallah samie laqwalkm, ealim bnyatkm wafealkm
